title: Commercial Building for sale in Chilaw
details:
* Two story commercial building located in heart of chilaw town, land extent - 3.45 perches, Square feet - 932 Sq, one common washroom, two access roads from both side of building, parking space for 4 vehicles.

* Price- 18 million, selling for highest offer, inspection only through Appointment! Brokers will not be entertained!
